fields.summary: Android: Size/Fill layout conflicts are not handled the same as iOS and Windows

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{code}
<Alloy>
	<Window class="container" layout="absolute">
    <View left="0" top="0" width="TI.UI.FILL" height="TI.UI.FILL" backgroundColor="yellow">
    </View>
    <View left="0" top="100" width="TI.UI.FILL" height="100" backgroundColor="red">
    </View>
    <View left="0" top="200" width="500" height="100" backgroundColor="green">
    </View>
    <Button left="0" top="300" width="TI.UI.FILL" height="100">BUTTON 1</Button>
    <Button left="0" top="400" width="500" height="100">BUTTON 2</Button>
	</Window>
</Alloy>
{code}
fields.summary: TI.UI.FILL does not work on Android and Mobile Web
fields.environment: Win, CLI version 5.0.5, Titanium SDK version 4.0.0.GA

comments.body:
Passed FR. PR merged. Changes are seen in SDK versions:
6.2.0.v20170822113609
7.0.0.v20170822142802
